Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Interface FunctionListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cli, ClientGameController, Gui
public interface FunctionListener
Interface implemented by both CLI and GUI, that represents all the graphical functions of the game

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addConstraint​(java.lang.String name)
    Method that add constraint to the Client
    void cardChoice​(java.lang.String challengerNick, boolean isYourPlayer)
    Method that handle the Card Choice phase
    void challengerChoice​(java.lang.String challengerNick, boolean isYourPlayer)
    Method that handle the Challenger phase
    void displayActions​(java.util.List<MessageType> actions)
    Method that handle the graphical display of the actions available in that moment(build,move,end turn)
    void newChatMessage​(java.lang.String nick, java.lang.String message)
    Method that handle new chat messages written by other clients
    void nickUsed()
    Method that notify the Client that the nickName selected is already in use in the Game
    void notifyLose​(java.lang.String nick, boolean isYourPlayer)
    Method that notify the Client that there is a loser
    void notifyWin​(java.lang.String nick)
    Method that notify the Client that there is a winner
    void notYourTurn()
    Method called when the Client send a message during the turn of the other Clients (except chat messages)
    void onEndGameDisconnection()
    Method called if the Client get disconnected after the game is ended
    void onErrorMessage​(java.lang.String stopper, boolean isYourPlayer)
    Method that handle non official CLI or GUI Version, called when the Server detect an error in the Messages
    void onLobbyDisconnection()
    Method called when the client get disconnected from the lobby (timer ended), notify the Client
    void onPingDisconnection()
    Method called when the client don't receive ping messages from the server, notify the Client
    void onStoppedGame​(java.lang.String stopper)
    Method called when a Client leave the game and stop the game
    void onTurnTimerEnded​(java.lang.String stopper)
    Method that handle the Turn Time ended event
    void placeWorker​(java.lang.String challengerNick, boolean isYourPlayer)
    Method that handle the Place Workers phase
    void removeConstraint​(java.lang.String name)
    Method that remove constraint from the Client
    void startGame()
    Method that notify the Client that the game is about to Start (The Lobby is Full)
    void startTurn​(java.lang.String nick, boolean isYourPlayer)
    Method that notify the Client that someone is Starting the turn
    void updateBoard​(java.lang.String nick, java.util.List<Square> squares, MessageType type)
    Method that handle the graphical update of the board after a move or build of other Clients
    void updateLobbyPlayer()
    Method that handle the graphical update of the players in the lobby
    void updatePlacedWorkers​(java.util.List<Square> squares)
    Method that handle the graphical update of the board after the workers of the other Clients are placed

  • Method Details

    • updateLobbyPlayer

      void updateLobbyPlayer()
      Method that handle the graphical update of the players in the lobby

    • nickUsed

      void nickUsed()
      Method that notify the Client that the nickName selected is already in use in the Game

    • startGame

      void startGame()
      Method that notify the Client that the game is about to Start (The Lobby is Full)

    • startTurn

      void startTurn​(java.lang.String nick, boolean isYourPlayer)
      Method that notify the Client that someone is Starting the turn
      Parameters:
      nick - The NickName of the Player Starting the turn
      isYourPlayer - Boolean that is True if the Client is starting the turn

    • challengerChoice

      void challengerChoice​(java.lang.String challengerNick, boolean isYourPlayer)
      Method that handle the Challenger phase
      Parameters:
      challengerNick - The NickName of the challenger
      isYourPlayer - Boolean that is True if the Client is the Challenger

    • cardChoice

      void cardChoice​(java.lang.String challengerNick, boolean isYourPlayer)
      Method that handle the Card Choice phase
      Parameters:
      challengerNick - The NickName of the Player that is choosing the Card
      isYourPlayer - Boolean that is True if the Client is choosing the Card

    • placeWorker

      void placeWorker​(java.lang.String challengerNick, boolean isYourPlayer)
      Method that handle the Place Workers phase
      Parameters:
      challengerNick - The NickName of the Player that is placing the workers
      isYourPlayer - Boolean that is True if the Client is placing the workers

    • updatePlacedWorkers

      void updatePlacedWorkers​(java.util.List<Square> squares)
      Method that handle the graphical update of the board after the workers of the other Clients are placed
      Parameters:
      squares - The squares in which the workers have been placed

    • updateBoard

      void updateBoard​(java.lang.String nick, java.util.List<Square> squares, MessageType type)
      Method that handle the graphical update of the board after a move or build of other Clients
      Parameters:
      nick - Nickname of the Client that made the move or build
      squares - The squares modified by the move or build
      type - The type of the Message(move or build)

    • notifyWin

      void notifyWin​(java.lang.String nick)
      Method that notify the Client that there is a winner
      Parameters:
      nick - NickName of the Winner

    • notifyLose

      void notifyLose​(java.lang.String nick, boolean isYourPlayer)
      Method that notify the Client that there is a loser
      Parameters:
      nick - NickName of the Winner
      isYourPlayer - Boolean that is True the Client is the loser

    • displayActions

      void displayActions​(java.util.List<MessageType> actions)
      Method that handle the graphical display of the actions available in that moment(build,move,end turn)
      Parameters:
      actions - The Actions available in that moment

    • addConstraint

      void addConstraint​(java.lang.String name)
      Method that add constraint to the Client
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the hero(constraint) to add to the Client

    • removeConstraint

      void removeConstraint​(java.lang.String name)
      Method that remove constraint from the Client
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the hero(constraint) to remove from the Client

    • onTurnTimerEnded

      void onTurnTimerEnded​(java.lang.String stopper)
      Method that handle the Turn Time ended event
      Parameters:
      stopper - Name of the client that stopped the Game

    • onStoppedGame

      void onStoppedGame​(java.lang.String stopper)
      Method called when a Client leave the game and stop the game
      Parameters:
      stopper - Name of the client that leave the game

    • onLobbyDisconnection

      void onLobbyDisconnection()
      Method called when the client get disconnected from the lobby (timer ended), notify the Client

    • onPingDisconnection

      void onPingDisconnection()
      Method called when the client don't receive ping messages from the server, notify the Client

    • onEndGameDisconnection

      void onEndGameDisconnection()
      Method called if the Client get disconnected after the game is ended

    • newChatMessage

      void newChatMessage​(java.lang.String nick, java.lang.String message)
      Method that handle new chat messages written by other clients
      Parameters:
      nick - NickName of the Client that wrote the message
      message - The Message written by the Client

    • onErrorMessage

      void onErrorMessage​(java.lang.String stopper, boolean isYourPlayer)
      Method that handle non official CLI or GUI Version, called when the Server detect an error in the Messages
      Parameters:
      stopper - The Client that stopped the game
      isYourPlayer - Boolean that is True the Client is the stopper

    • notYourTurn

      void notYourTurn()
      Method called when the Client send a message during the turn of the other Clients (except chat messages)
